normalised: Hey everyone! Solar rooftop subsidies are a great initiative! My cousin, Priya, got one in Chennai last year. Rupee fifty thousand off - not bad, eh? She says her electricity bill dropped drastically. Thinking of getting one myself this Diwali. Maybe have a biryani party with the savings?
